Description.Text: This is one of the newest and best quality hotels in the Sultanahmet area of the city. Suitable for upscale tourists looking to be close to the major attractions.(05/08 JM) This is a modern corner block. The hotel is situated in the heart of Sultanahmet/Sirkeci within walking distance of all the main attractions, including Topkapi Palace, the Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar and Eminonu Pier. The Taksim area, well known for its wide variety of restaurants and bars, is a short taxi ride away on the other side of the Golden Horn. There is also a convenient tram stop just two minutes walk from the hotel, which provides a direct link to most of the Old Town.

Guest Rooms - Due to the shape of the building, the rooms vary in size from small to large. However, all are well appointed with good quality furnishings. Some of the rooms which face the back of the hotel do have a fairly small window but all are individually air conditioned and bright. The white tiled bathrooms are equipped with either a bath and shower or shower only.
